attributes.action: To not call fuel tax a 'green tax'  unless the money is spent on trees, improving public transport, or researching alternative energy sources .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Calling it 'green' is just an exuse to tax us more. Fuel tax is a disproportianate tax upon the poor. The more wealthy MP's will still be able to afford four wheel cars. But i wont be able to afford to use the trains as they cost alot and if i relied on my public bus service i would get the sack from work because they often dont turn up.
